ygData.subject: RE: Nybright Sisters and taking the lives of our fellow man
ygData.msgSnippet: Esteemed brother, Are they not a gang of female rogues born of a drunkard in Kelethin? Do they not share an allegiance with those base bandits known as Dervish
ygData.messageBody:
Esteemed brother,

Are they not a gang of female rogues born of a drunkard in Kelethin? Do they
not share an allegiance with those base bandits known as Dervish Cutthroats?
Among their number is seen many a human. Be they human or some other
civilized
race, I would believe them undeserving of assault; but do guard yourself from
harm if accosted. When first I approached these war ready females, I had
assumed they were human. Alas, I could be mistaken. Good journey.

In Quellious' name,

Manjushri,
Bearer of the yellow sash of the Ashen Order
(Fennin Ro)

At 04:06 AM 9/13/99 -0700, you wrote:
>From: Jeffrey Sue <jsue@...>
>
>The Nybrights are not human.
>
>
>At 11:18 AM 9/13/1999 -0500, you wrote:
>>From: "John N. Mosqueda" <mosquito@...>
>>
>>Brother monk,
>>
>>The Nybright sisters will serve as no obstacle to one of your training. Even
>>through fourteen orders of training, I have considered them less than
>equal to
>>the task of one on one combat. Your abilities are best served in the undead
>>depths of Unrest or the outlying Cauldron. It would be my hope that no monk
>>among us would go so far as to take the life of a fellow human in order to
>>gain


---------------------------------------------------
John N. Mosqueda
